article_title: Obama Flies Luis Gutierrez on Air Force One for Exec Amnesty Celebration
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER





On Friday, President Barack Obama flew Rep. Luis Gutierrez (D-IL) on Air Force One with other Democrats to a speech at a Las Vegas high school (Del Sol) where he delivered a speech to celebrate and promote his executive amnesty.

Others aboard Air Force One, according to the White House, were Sen. Majority Leader Harry Reid (D-NV), House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi (D-CA), Sen. Bob Menendez (D-NJ), Rep. Xavier Becerra (D-CA), Rep. Steven Horsford (D-NV), Rep. Ben Ray Lujan (D-NM), Rep. Dina Titus (D-NB), Arturo Rodriguez, the president of the United Farm Workers, Marc Morial, the president of the National Urban League, and Gabriel Salguero of the National Latino Evangelical Coalition.

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

“It’s a beautiful day to celebrate #ImmigrationAction in Las Vegas!” Gutierrez, who was arguably the most vocal pro-amnesty advocate, said.

It’s a beautiful day to celebrate #ImmigrationAction in Las Vegas! #latism #p2 #twill #immigration pic.twitter.com/Leavp0NCQi — Luis V. Gutierrez (@RepGutierrez) November 21, 2014
